General.Name: Beijing ZEHO Waterfront Ecological Environment Treatment Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing ZEHO Waterfront Ecological Environment Treatment Co., Ltd. focuses on the construction of the ecosystem. It offers ecological preservation, ecological restoration, water environment governance, and ecological landscape services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Tsinghua Science Park Science & Tech Bld, Beijing, China, 100084
